content: the easiest triangle by justine malone you can make this scarf or shawl any size with any gauge of yarn you will be creating a triangle by starting with only 3 stitches which is the bottom point of the scarf simply knit until it s the size you desire yarn needles neck scarf 50 grams use the needle size appropriate for your tiny shawl 100 grams yarn proper shawl 300 grams big old wrap 500+ grams pattern abbreviations 1 cast on 3 stitches k / knit 2 kfb knit until 1 st remains s1wyif 3 repeat step 2 until desired size st / stitch es 4 bind off all sts in pattern kfb / knit into front of stitch then back of same stitch s1 / slip one stitch wyif / with yarn in front castawayyarnshop com 100fourthstreet entranceonwilson 707 546 yarn santarosa ca95401
